question: Scintefic progress has a great influence on society.Do you think it is a positive or negative development.
text: Engineering sciences is reaching new levels of improvement day by day, Strive hard to make human's lives easy with various aspects, So as well affect their daily lives. Nowadays there has been a debate over this that the general public has greatly been prompted by technology. I think this is favourable changes because people are closer to each other than before and give more longevity to them. Further in this ,essay I will explain these reasons along with examples.

To commence with, The first reason is that the masses will be more connected with each other than before because info technology devotes many appliances to people with which they can effortlessly communicate within seconds. Since there are many applications available that can be installed on their gadgets.Thus it provides the opportunities to be more social and extroverted rather than introverted.  To cite an example, Whats app which is a connectivity app that has approx 2 billion users around the globe.

Furthermore, The second reason for supporting this elucidation is public have more life span. Moreover, Medical sciences are making efforts in the health sectors and they are able to research every ailment thoroughly and put forward prevention steps in terms of medicine, surgery or another effective biomedical source. Additionally, Food sciences are being able to produce artificial eating materials which have all the required minerals and vitamins and which have a positive effect on human health. To illustrate, According to W.H.O,  The 21st-century people's lives duration are increased by 20% compared to the previous.

Finally, Scientific progression has a huge sway on society and which is a helpful move, Due to this individuals have firm relation bonding than used to be in the past and dwellers have a long existence time. Given this situation, It seems that authorities should invest more in modern education and provide more funds for research purposes, So as result they can help mankind in different ways.

error_list.error_des: The noun phrase essay seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
